attrib:
RADIUS: 315
STUN DURATION 2 / 2.25 / 2.5 / 2.75
STOMP DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200 / 250
cmb:
MANA COST: 130
COOLDOWN: 13
desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
name: centaur_hoof_stomp

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 0/0/0/0
COOLDOWN: 8
desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
notes: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.
lore: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
name: centaur_double_edge

desc: Centaur immediately counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.
notes:
Return's effect begins when the attack begins an attack, not when the attack is completed.
Return deals damage to towers.
lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
name: centaur_return

attrib:
CHARGE DURATION: 3.75
STRENGTH MULTIPLIER DAMAGE: 1 / 2 / 3
SLOW DURATION: 1.5
TRAMPLE RADIUS: 105
MOVEMENT SLOW: 100%
cmb:
MANA COST: 100
COOLDOWN: 90/75/60
desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow enemy units they tread upon. Each enemy can be trampled once and takes damage based on the Warrunner's strength.
lore: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.
name: centaur_stampede
